andydunstall/piko

reverse proxy for secure service tunneling and easy Kubernetes hosting

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • List of tunneling tools and self-hosted ngrok alternatives
  • Remote access to machines using peer-to-peer networking
  • cross-platform proxy utility with routing rules, sync, and multi-protocol support
  • Rust framework for building fast, programmable network proxies and load balancers
  • Scans Kubernetes resources for security risks
  • Reverse proxy for Docker and other services with web UI, automation tools, and traffic control
  • Connects local environment to Kubernetes cluster network
  • Honeypots for monitoring network traffic and credentials
  • Exposes local servers to the internet via public URLs
